cardType.name: Status
cardType.rules: Status cards are the yellow cards. They must be placed face up in front of the player who received it. They can be removed from play in 3 ways: * The cards rules mention when they should be removed from play * Any player takes the amount of drinks mentioned in the upper right corner of the card * Another card is played that allows the removal of status cards As long as a status card is in play, its rules must be followed on every turn.
